    • transparency

      private double transparency​(LightSource lightSource, Intersectable.GeoPoint geoPoint)
      Function for calculating the level of shading at a point. We would like to get partial shading in case the body or bodies that block the light source from the point have transparency to one degree or another * @param lightSource

      Returns:
